page.title: 03Peter Tate - Local Resident
page.content: Peter Tate has lived in Avebury since 1970."Apart from the odd new bungalow replacing old cottages the housing has not changed.There has been a gradual build up in the number of visitors coming to the village. Today these are more enquiring especially those from foreign lands and young people. I am pleased with the way that Avebury is administered for the tourists, both tactfully and diplomatically. I am concerned that all visitors to Avebury and the surrounding district have a really good time.I enjoy living in Avebury because it is a friendly village.Villagers and tourists appear to exist together in harmony. I would make no changes but they will inevitably occur naturally whether for better or worse. a place like Avebury does not stand still."
